question: You have received a letter from your neighbour complaining about noise from your house/flat.Write a letter to your neighbour. In your letterexplain the cause of the noiseapologise for the noisedescribe what action you will take to solve the problemWrite at least 150 words.You do NOT need to write any addresses.Begin your letter as follows:Dear ……………….You should spend about 20 minutes on this task.
text: I am writing this letter in response to your previous letter which I received yesterday, complaining regarding the unpleasant voice from my apartment.

Actually, there is reconstruction going on at my residence. As you know, the rainy season is going on and my roof is leaking when there is rain. In order to fix this issue, the workers are using the machines. Thus, the noise is coming from there.

I apologise for the depth of my heart as I did not realise that it would cause too much inconvenience to you. I admit that the noise is extremely irritating which ultimately cause headache since you are living next door. You might be suffering from the same problem.

Although the work can not stop yet, still I have a solution to this. I would ask the contractor to hire more workers so that the work would be done in the next two days. The more workers, the less time it would take to complete reconstruction.
